articles.title: The biggest underestimated security threat of today? Advanced persistent teenagers - TechCrunch
articles.description: These attacks are highly effective, have caused huge data breaches and resulted in huge ransoms paid to make the hackers go away.
articles.content: If you ask some of the top cybersecurity leaders in the field what’s on their worry list, you might not expect bored teenagers to be top of mind. But in recent years, this entirely new generation of … [+3972 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Strickland
articles.title: A radio transmitter not used since 1981 is helping Voyager 1 send messages to Earth - CNN
articles.description: Voyager 1 relays messages to NASA’s mission control team after losing contact due to a technical issue. The aging spacecraft is relying on an old radio transmitter.
articles.content:
